### Summary
Provide a clear and concise description of the feature you want to request.

### Why?
Explain the reason for this feature and what problem it solves.

### Proposed Approach
Describe how this feature could be implemented or structured.

### Additional Context
Add screenshots, related issues, or any supporting information.
